channel.title: Fan Fiction
channel.description:
Not meaning to advertise so don't take it like that lol
Just curious as to who actually reads/writes stories here or anywhere else really.
I used to write Harry Potter stories all the time ;D
I mostly just read like the better reviewed Harry Potter themed stories now. Generally romance ones 0_o ( don't hate )
would love to hear which books/stories you read/write.

item.title: Fan Fiction
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:9, topic:425684”]when i was like 8 i wrote/draw my own willy wonka candy factory :)[/quote]I had no idea they had that as a fic! I absolutely loved willy wonka. You still have the story up?

Read full topic

item.title: Fan Fiction
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:6, topic:425684”]I totally want to rewrite harry potter. It’s on one of of my to-do lists somewhere on my hd.

I did think of writing some lore for runescape about the god wars though. I had an epic idea and all then I kind of never finished it :/[/quote]yeah I would get to like chapter six or seven of my fic and would get bored lol

Read full topic

item.title: Fan Fiction

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I totally want to rewrite harry potter. It’s on one of of my to-do lists somewhere on my hd.

I did think of writing some lore for runescape about the god wars though. I had an epic idea and all then I kind of never finished it

item.title: Fan Fiction
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Any random thing we could think of really, mostly of his own thought up heroes and villains while I thought of the challenges they would go though. It was fun, he was in high school at the time I think.

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:3, topic:425684”]My cousin, who is now an English teacher, used to write Comic books all the time when I was like 7 and we would brainstorm random stuff to write. :P[/quote]I could never get into comic books myself but what were they about?
